name: The Doll Maker
description:
In the town of Dalhurst people have started going missing. As the local police officer its up to you to investigate. However what you find is that you will need to fight to survive in this horror/action game. The Doll Maker is a topdown twin sticks shooter inspired by Call of Duty Zombies and Dead Ops Arcade. Strive to survive as long as possible or attempt to stop the doll maker and save the town of Dalhurst.

Made for Marist Summer Game Institute 2018

Design: Louis Artale

Art/Writing: Corinne Stuckey

Programming: Josh Seligman
